sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' const Job = (props) => { const {job, pay, name, phone, location, description, info} = props; return (
Good Job: {job}
Pay: {pay}
  • Name: {name}
  • Phone number: {phone}
Location: {location}
Description of Job: {description}
Additional info: {info}
) } export default Job
